commands.name: az logic integration-account batch-configuration create
commands.summary: Create a batch configuration for an integration account.
examples: az logic integration-account batch-configuration create -g rg -n batch --integration-account-name name --batch-group-name group --release-criteria '{recurrence:{frequency:Minute,interval:1},messageCount:10,batchSize:10000}'

commands.name: az logic integration-account batch-configuration delete
commands.summary: Delete a batch configuration for an integration account.
examples: az logic integration-account batch-configuration delete -g rg -n batch --integration-account-name name

commands.name: az logic integration-account batch-configuration list
commands.summary: List the batch configurations for an integration account.
examples: az logic integration-account batch-configuration list -g rg --integration-account-name name

commands.name: az logic integration-account batch-configuration show
commands.summary: Show a batch configuration for an integration account.
examples: az logic integration-account batch-configuration show -g rg -n batch --integration-account-name name

commands.name: az logic integration-account batch-configuration update
commands.summary: Update a batch configuration for an integration account.
commands.syntax:
az logic integration-account batch-configuration update [--add]
                                                        [--batch-configuration-name]
                                                        [--batch-group-name]
                                                        [--changed-time]
                                                        [--created-time]
                                                        [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                        [--ids]
                                                        [--integration-account-name]
                                                        [--location]
                                                        [--metadata]
                                                        [--release-criteria]
                                                        [--remove]
                                                        [--resource-group]
                                                        [--set]
                                                        [--subscription]
                                                        [--tags]
examples: az logic integration-account batch-configuration update -g rg -n batch --integration-account-name name --release-criteria '{recurrence:{frequency:Minute,interval:2},messageCount:20,batchSize:12000}'
